info.name: Welch's Fruit Snacks
info.shortDesc: Welch’s® are America’s Favorite Fruit Snacks®, made with Real Fruit delivering delicious taste the whole family loves.

info.name: Mott's Fruit Snacks
info.shortDesc: Kids will love the delicious taste of these fruit snacks, made with real fruit juice and natural flavors. Learn more about Mott's® Fruit Flavored Snacks today.

info.name: Fruit Roll Ups
info.shortDesc: Fruit-flavored, gummy treats made with no artificial flavors for a delicious gelatin free, gluten free snack
